name: impassively
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
in a way that expresses no emotion or reaction: The defendant sat impassively in the dock while evidence was given against him. He stared impassively out of the window. See
impassive
More examplesFewer examplesThe group’s drummer played impassively in the background.He listened impassively until I was finished talking.A swan glided impassively downstream.
